block.name: Ex: Delay
block.doc:
The delay block imposes a delay in a stream of items.
Notes on the set_delay registered method: The delay is measured in an exact count of items. \ If the delay is positive, zero-valued items will be inserted into the stream. \ If the delay is negative, items will be remove from the stream. \ If the delay value is set before the flow graph is executed, \ the delay will be imposed at the begining of the stream. \ However, if the flow graph is already running, \ the delay injection will be non-deterministic.
